intro: Tactics meet passion – lead your squad to glory!
description:
From the modest soccer pitch to the large stadium: You'll make history in "Football, Tactics & Glory – Treble Deluxe Edition". Not only are you a coach, you're also a strategist, motivator and the architect of your career. Every decision counts, both on and off the pitch, from line-ups and transfers to the next series of moves. This is not only a question of reflexes and button-mashing, but about sophisticated tactics!

Use the integrated editor to shape your own football world: Create unique players with personality, build your own leagues and clubs, design club badges or recreate legendary rivalries. In the transfer market, you'll juggle the player budget, engage in skillful negotiations and form your dream team. The dynamic weather system with four seasons will provide additional challenges while your team plays its heart out!

Whether you corner the opponent with sophisticated defensive tactics, or the fans cheer you on with your attacking football strategy – every victory, goal and tactical decision reflects your playing style. Take a seat on the coach's bench, because in this game, football isn't merely played, it's lived, felt and celebrated!


The Treble Deluxe Edition offers:
1. The acclaimed main game including all upgrades and optimizations
2. The Football Stars expansion
3. The Manager’s Journey expansion


The highlights at a glance:
• Turn-based matches: Plan every move precisely, be proactive and outsmart your opponents!
• Tactics beat reflexes: Your far-sighted strategy will determine victory or defeat.
• Coach upgrade system: Develop your own style with numerous skills. What will you focus on; the promotion of young talent, intensive training or smart transfers? 
• From amateur club to world champion: Lead an underdog team to the top of the international game – the ultimate manager's dream!
• Diverse career paths: Accept job offers from different clubs and build up a great reputation so that the top clubs will eventually come knocking at your door.
• Brand new talent system: Invest in highly talented stars or in less expensive talent – discover a fascinating dimension in player management.
• Innovative transfer system: Send scouts out to other continents, search for specific players and negotiate lucrative deals when buying and selling.
• Detailed statistics for fans: A game world with a comprehensive history – records, legends, fascinating facts and your personal stats.
• A lively simulation with improved AI: All the clubs worldwide act independently – they play, transfer react to your tactics and motivate their teams to beat you.
• Local multiplayer (Hotseat): Whether it's a tactical duel for two or a major tournament with the whole crew, anyone can become a top coach!
